/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/controls.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/objloader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/quaternion_utils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/tangentspace.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/text2D.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/common/vboindexer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/OpenGLExample.dir/src/window.cpp.o  -o OpenGLExample  -lglfw -lGL -lGLEW
